text:
Violent felons commit the large majority of gun crimes. 

If Democrats are serious about stopping gun crime, they’ll support my bill to increase penalties and mandatory minimums for gun offenses. https://t.co/QiEzhh4DYs

If President Biden thinks it’s unethical for his staff to enrich themselves at the expense of the taxpayer, then why are his aides—many of whom have large amounts of college debt—designing a plan to transfer their debt to Americans who never went to college? https://t.co/y3gejOnqKl
Today marks 78 years since the Allied forces stormed the beaches of Normandy. D-Day reminds us of the courage and heroic sacrifices our troops have made for freedom.

33 years ago, the Chinese Communist Party rolled tanks into Tiananmen Square, killing thousands of peaceful protestors seeking freedom. We will never forget the true face of Chinese communism that we saw that day or the bravery and sacrifice of those Chinese students.

Upcoming travel? Friendly reminder to check your passport expiration date and contact my office if you need help with an expedited renewal before you leave!
https://t.co/v549ZXoMTR
